Research

2018.   M. Eberhardt and D. Vollrath.   World Development.   109:483-496.

2017.   A. Adeyinka, S. Salau, and D. Vollrath.   Structural Change, Fundamentals, and Growth, A Framework and Case Studies.   Ed. M. McMillan, D. Rodrik, C. Sepulveda. IFPRI..  

Urbanization with and without industrialization

2016.   D. Gollin, R. Jedwab, and D. Vollrath.   Journal of Economic Growth.   21(1).

2015.   R. Jedwab and D. Vollrath.   Explorations in Economic History.   58(C).  Data and Code

Household Response to Government Debt, Evidence from Life Insurance Holdings

2015.   S. C. Craig, E. C. Hoang, and D. Vollrath.   Journal of Money, Credit and Banking.   47(5).

2014.   D. Vollrath.   Journal of Development Economics.   108:106-118.  Data and Code

2013.   D. Vollrath.   Eurasian Economic Review.   3(1).

2013.   D. Vollrath.   Explorations in Economic History.   50(2).  Data and Code

2013.   I. Hoxha, S. Kalemli-Ozcan, and D. Vollrath.   Journal of Development Economics.   103(C).  

Land tenure, population, and long-run growth

2012.   D. Vollrath.   Journal of Population Economics.   25(3).  

The agricultural basis of comparative development

2011.   D. Vollrath.   Journal of Economic Growth.   16(4).  

Inequality in Landownership, the Emergence of Human-Capital Promoting Institutions, and the Great Divergence
